A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the movie was great! Plenty of unexpected twists and an amazing cast! I was so glad to see certain characters get more fleshed out and they dynamic between Rey and Kylo was so good and interesting ... I cannot wait to see what's in store for them in the next movie!\n\nIt was fun to speculate along the last two years but seeing that some \"fans\" are posting bad reviews because what they thought would happen didn't is sad. It's a beautifully made movie and I would recommend seeing it.
